title: ObjectiveTurret
description: This is a objective turret positoning device.

Resolution.description: The motion resolution of this device

PositionLinearityError.description: The positioning error associated with this device. Typically expressed as % error.

SettingTime.description: Measures the time it takes for this device to stabilize at the target position

Repetability.description: Measures the precision with which this device is capable of returning to a previously visited position

Name.description: A user defined name for this element

MovementAxes.description: The axis along which this device moves.

XTravelRange.description: The X axis range this device is capable of moving in

YTravelRange.description: The Y axis range this device is capable of moving in

ZTravelRange.description: The Z axis range this device is capable of moving in

MaxVelocity.description: The maximum velocity this device is capable of moving at

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of the component

LotNumber.description: The lot number of the component

SpecsFile.description: Attach a PDF file with the specifications for the component as provided by the manufacturer

tier.description: The tier level of this component.
